message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $140. I believe it's a great deal for both of us, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to buy the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to come down a little further to $135. This still leaves room for us both to have a good deal. Let's make it happen!
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $130. Can you meet me there?
